message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects its worth and potential for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. While your offer is appreciated, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product has a high value to you, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise.
